https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hDZSN3OlH9FWM4grIF66OQdnAIU.jpg Set against the background of a broken U.S. immigration system, A Place to Be is a love story between two young men, Abel & Diego. When tragedy strikes and Diego's immigration status is revealed, Abel and Diego discover the power of love during uncertain times. A Place to Be
